issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.nj.com/advice/2024/05/miss-manners-my-neighbor-borrowed-pure-vanilla-extract-and-had-the-nerve-to-return-the-imitation-variety.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nj.com%2Fadvice%2F2024%2F05%2Fmiss-manners-my-neighbor-borrowed-pure-vanilla-extract-and-had-the-nerve-to-return-the-imitation-variety.html) ### Comment > This article link was in my Google discover feed.
